item.description:

item.title: Asiana 214 pilot realised plane flying too low - BBC News
item.description:
BBC News
Asiana 214 pilot realised plane flying too low
BBC News
The senior pilot in the cockpit of Asiana flight 214 realised the plane was too low when it was flying at only 500ft (152m), an official has said. The Boeing 777 crash-landed at the San Francisco airport on Saturday, killing two passengers and injuring 180.
